text: Cho Hyung-gon (born 23 June 1990 in Uijeongbu) is a South Korean ice hockey defenceman currently playing for Anyang Halla of Asia League Ice Hockey (ALIH). He competed at the 2018 Winter Olympics. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1990 births Category:Living people Category:Ice hockey players at the 2018 Winter Olympics Category:South Korean ice hockey defencemen Category:Olympic ice hockey players of South Korea Category:Anyang Halla players Category:Competitors at the 2011 Winter Universiade
title: Cho Hyung-gon
